channel.title: Root: Rootjammer
channel.description:
These sessions are scheduled for 3 hours. They will be recorded using StreamYard.
This is a reskin of the Root TTRPG, using the quickstart rules. Being able to attend each session is ideal, but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.
The World Tree is a wild and dangerous place. It needs brave Vagabonds to venture between the crystal spheres and do odd jobs in the midst of war.
We will be using the [X-Card](http://tinyurl.com/x-card-rpg), as well as Lines and Veils. We will abide by [the Gauntlet Inclusivity Policy](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-inclusivity-policy.html).
[date=2020-02-03 time=18:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2020-02-03 time=21:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 1](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LvDRaOumYQarkqonqZG) [date=2020-02-10 time=18:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2020-02-10 time=21:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 2](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LvDRgyAupAeywfv13Xj) [date=2020-02-17 time=18:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2020-02-17 time=21:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 3](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LvDRmlByW9g7b2Df8K9) [date=2020-02-24 time=18:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2020-02-24 time=21:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 4](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LvDRtI6f9jf5aterxEC)

@Thoobn wrote:

These sessions are scheduled for 3 hours. They will be recorded using StreamYard.

This is a reskin of the Root TTRPG, using the quickstart rules. Being able to attend each session is ideal, but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.

The World Tree is a wild and dangerous place. It needs brave Vagabonds to venture between the crystal spheres and do odd jobs in the midst of war.

We will be using the X-Card, as well as Lines and Veils. We will abide by the Gauntlet Inclusivity Policy.
